metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17476 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 4.0.x before 4.0.28, 5.0.x before 5.0.26,and 6.0.x before 6.0.3, when cookie support is disabled, might allow remoteattackers to hijack web sessions and consequently gain privileges via acrafted email.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17476` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.3-1
otrs2 - 6.0.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.3-1').
